# toDo_list

Check the [Demo](https://vivian1223.github.io/toDo_list/)

JavaScript
---
* Vue used 
* JSON Server API as temporary Database
* RESTful API uesed

CSS
---
* SCSS used
* design theory applied to class & uitities management
